results.title: Simvastatin Attenuates Contrast-Induced Nephropathy through Modulation of Oxidative Stress, Proinflammatory Myeloperoxidase, and Nitric Oxide
results.text_hl: The results showed that @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@SSTN@@@ dose dependently attenuated CM-induced rise of @CHEMICAL_Creatinine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D003404 @@@creatinine@@@, @CHEMICAL_Urea @CHEMICAL_MESH:D014508 @@@urea@@@, and @<m>DISEASE_Muscular_Dystrophy_Congenital_Megaconial_Type</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C566527 @@@structural abnormalities@@@ suggesting its nephroprotective effect.

citations.NLM: Al-Otaibi KE, Al Elaiwi AM, Tariq M, Al-Asmari AK. Simvastatin Attenuates Contrast-Induced Nephropathy through Modulation of Oxidative Stress, Proinflammatory Myeloperoxidase, and Nitric Oxide Oxid Med Cell Longev. 2012;2012():831748. PMID: 23097681
citations.BibTeX: @article{23097681, title={Simvastatin Attenuates Contrast-Induced Nephropathy through Modulation of Oxidative Stress, Proinflammatory Myeloperoxidase, and Nitric Oxide}, author={Al-Otaibi KE and Al Elaiwi AM and Tariq M and Al-Asmari AK}, journal={Oxid Med Cell Longev}, volume={2012}, pages={831748}}

results.title: Simvastatin therapy in adolescent mice attenuates HFD-induced depression-like behavior by reducing hippocampal neuroinflammation.
results.text_hl: Additionally, @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@SMV@@@ could reduce HFD-induced @<m>DISEASE_Muscular_Dystrophy_Congenital_Megaconial_Type</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C566527 @@@structural abnormality@@@, @DISEASE_Nerve_Degeneration @DISEASE_MESH:D009410 @@@neuronal injury@@@, serotonergic system disturbance and pro-@DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammatory@@@ cytokine over-expression in the hippocampus.

citations.NLM: Wu H, Lv W, Pan Q, Kalavagunta PK, Liu Q, Qin G, Cai M, Zhou L, Wang T, Xia Z, Shang J. Simvastatin therapy in adolescent mice attenuates HFD-induced depression-like behavior by reducing hippocampal neuroinflammation. J Affect Disord. 2019 Jan 15;243():83-95. PMID: 30236762
citations.BibTeX: @article{30236762, title={Simvastatin therapy in adolescent mice attenuates HFD-induced depression-like behavior by reducing hippocampal neuroinflammation.}, author={Wu H and Lv W and Pan Q and Kalavagunta PK and Liu Q and Qin G and Cai M and Zhou L and Wang T and Xia Z and Shang J}, journal={J Affect Disord}, volume={243}, pages={83-95}}
